fields_of_interest: Consumers, Energy, Environment, Single market, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
EU policies on: environment, energy, internal market, trade, retail and social protection. 
We follow updates and attend meetings and conferences on the above policy topics
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: meetings at EP and Commission, conferences, workshops
goals__remit: EDRA/GHIN is the voice of home improvement retailing in Europe. Our association represents some of the best known brands in the retail sector. Eight of our worldwide members are represented in the Deloitte Top 250 Global Retailers. Our membership includes 119 home centres operating over 23,000 stores in 102 countries, employing over 1.3 million people and generating total revenues of approximately €255bn. Our headquarters is based in Cologne, supported by our EU Office in Brussels and Asia Office in Tokyo.
